text:
[Verse]
Raindrops on my face
Heartbeat starts to race
Feel the music play
Take my breath away

[Verse 2]
Puddles on the street
Moving to the beat
Shoes are soaking wet
But I have no regret

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Feel alive again
Steps in sync with you
Makes my dreams come true

[Verse 3]
Clouds begin to clear
Sunshine's almost near
But I love this storm
Where our hearts are warm

[Verse 4]
Jump and spin around
Never touch the ground
Laughing in the night
Under city lights

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Feel alive again
Steps in sync with you
Makes my dreams come true
title: Dancing in the Rain
